verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to himself לִבּ֔וֹ <S%H3820><s%> in his heart עַתָּ֛ה <S%H6258><s%> Now אֶסָּפֶ֥ה <S%H5595><s%> I shall now perish יוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> day אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> one בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul אֵֽין־ <S%H369><s%> There לִ֨י ט֜וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [there is] nothing better כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for me than that הִמָּלֵ֥ט <S%H4422><s%> I should speedily אִמָּלֵ֣ט ׀ <S%H4422><s%> escape אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land פְּלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וְנוֹאַ֨שׁ <S%H2976><s%> shall despair מִמֶּ֤נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> and Saul לְבַקְשֵׁ֤נִי <S%H1245><s%> of me to seek עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> anymore בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> me any more in any coast יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְנִמְלַטְתִּ֖י <S%H4422><s%> so shall I escape מִיָּדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> out of his hand

וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> arose דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> And David וַיַּעֲבֹ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> and he passed over ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְשֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> with the six מֵא֥וֹת <S%H3967><s%> hundred אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who עִמּ֑וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אָכִ֥ישׁ <S%H397><s%> that [were] with him unto Achish בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מָע֖וֹךְ <S%H4582><s%> of Maoch מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king גַּֽת׃ <S%H1661><s%> of Gath

וַיֵּשֶׁב֩ <S%H3427><s%> dwelt דָּוִ֨ד <S%H1732><s%> And David עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אָכִ֥ישׁ <S%H397><s%> with Achish בְּגַ֛ת <S%H1661><s%> at Gath ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וַאֲנָשָׁ֖יו <S%H376><s%> every man אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> each וּבֵית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> with his household דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> [even] David וּשְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> with his two נָשָׁ֔יו <S%H802><s%> wives אֲחִינֹ֙עַם֙ <S%H293><s%> Ahinoam הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֔ית <S%H3159><s%> the Jezreelitess וַאֲבִיגַ֥יִל <S%H26><s%> and Abigail אֵֽשֶׁת־ <S%H802><s%> wife נָבָ֖ל <S%H5037><s%> Nabal's הַֽכַּרְמְלִֽית׃ <S%H3762><s%> the Carmelitess

וַיֻּגַּ֣ד <S%H5046><s%> And it was told לְשָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָרַ֥ח <S%H1272><s%> was fled דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> that David גַּ֑ת <S%H1661><s%> to Gath וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no [יֹוסַף כ] (יָסַ֥ף <S%H3254><s%> add ק) ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again לְבַקְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H1245><s%> and he sought ס

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אָכִ֗ישׁ <S%H397><s%> unto Achish אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If נָא֩ <S%H4994><s%> now מָצָ֨אתִי <S%H4672><s%> If I have now found חֵ֤ן <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5869><s%> in thine eyes יִתְּנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> let them give לִ֣י מָק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> me a place בְּאַחַ֛ת <S%H259><s%> in some עָרֵ֥י <S%H5892><s%> town הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> in the country וְאֵ֣שְׁבָה <S%H3427><s%> that I may dwell שָּׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there וְלָ֨מָּה <S%H4100><s%> why יֵשֵׁ֧ב <S%H3427><s%> dwell עַבְדְּךָ֛ <S%H5650><s%> there for why should thy servant בְּעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> city הַמַּמְלָכָ֖ה <S%H4467><s%> in the royal עִמָּֽךְ׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

וַיִּתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> gave ל֥וֹ אָכִ֛ישׁ <S%H397><s%> Then Achish בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צִֽקְלָ֑ג <S%H6860><s%> him Ziklag לָכֵ֞ן <S%H3651><s%> therefore הָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> has צִֽקְלַג֙ <S%H6860><s%> wherefore Ziklag לְמַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> pertaineth unto the kings יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this פ

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become מִסְפַּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> the number הַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> was a full year אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after יָשַׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> dwelt דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> that David בִּשְׂדֵ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> in the country פְלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> was a year וְאַרְבָּעָ֥ה <S%H702><s%> and four חֳדָשִֽׁים׃ <S%H2320><s%> months

וַיַּ֤עַל <S%H5927><s%> went up דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David וַֽאֲנָשָׁ֔יו <S%H582><s%> and his men וַֽיִּפְשְׁט֛וּ <S%H6584><s%> and invaded אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַגְּשׁוּרִ֥י <S%H1651><s%> the Geshurites [וְהַגִּרְזִי כ] (וְהַגִּזְרִ֖י <S%H1511><s%> Gezrites ק) וְהָעֲמָלֵקִ֑י <S%H6003><s%> and the Amalekites כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for הֵ֜נָּה <S%H2007><s%> for those יֹשְׁב֤וֹת <S%H3427><s%> the inhabitants הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> of the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> from מֵֽעוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> [nations were] of old בּוֹאֲךָ֥ <S%H935><s%> as thou goest שׁ֖וּרָה <S%H7793><s%> to Shur וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> even unto the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וְהִכָּ֤ה <S%H5221><s%> smote דָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and did not יְחַיֶּ֖ה <S%H2421><s%> alive אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and left neither man וְאִשָּׁ֑ה <S%H802><s%> nor woman וְלָקַח֩ <S%H3947><s%> and took away צֹ֨אן <S%H6629><s%> the sheep וּבָקָ֜ר <S%H1241><s%> and the oxen וַחֲמֹרִ֤ים <S%H2543><s%> and the asses וּגְמַלִּים֙ <S%H1581><s%> and the camels וּבְגָדִ֔ים <S%H899><s%> and the apparel וַיָּ֖שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> and returned וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אָכִֽישׁ׃ <S%H397><s%> to Achish

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אָכִ֔ישׁ <S%H397><s%> And Achish אַל־ <S%H408><s%> Whither פְּשַׁטְתֶּ֖ם <S%H6584><s%> have ye made a road הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> age וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> David עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> Against נֶ֤גֶב <S%H5045><s%> Against the south יְהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and against נֶ֣גֶב <S%H5045><s%> and against the south הַיַּרְחְמְאֵלִ֔י <S%H3397><s%> of the Jerahmeelites וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and against נֶ֖גֶב <S%H5045><s%> and against the south הַקֵּינִֽי׃ <S%H7017><s%> of the Kenites

וְאִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> neither man וְאִשָּׁ֜ה <S%H802><s%> nor woman לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not יְחַיֶּ֣ה <S%H2421><s%> saved דָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> And David לְהָבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> to bring גַת֙ <S%H1661><s%> [tidings] to Gath לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> Otherwise יַגִּ֥דוּ <S%H5046><s%> Lest they should tell עָלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> about לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> on us saying כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> So עָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> So did דָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> David וְכֹ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> and so מִשְׁפָּט֔וֹ <S%H4941><s%> and so [will be] his manner כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַ֨יָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> all the while אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> he יָשַׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> he dwelleth בִּשְׂדֵ֥ה <S%H7704><s%> in the country פְלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines

וַיַּאֲמֵ֥ן <S%H539><s%> believed אָכִ֖ישׁ <S%H397><s%> And Achish בְּדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> David לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הַבְאֵ֤שׁ <S%H887><s%> utterly הִבְאִישׁ֙ <S%H887><s%> to abhor בְּעַמּ֣וֹ <S%H5971><s%> He hath made his people בְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Israel וְהָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> will become לִ֖י לְעֶ֥בֶד <S%H5650><s%> him therefore he shall be my servant עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever פ
